TopicTitle: Zooming in and out in the VAB

Articles.Content:
Well, lately I've been working on larger rockets, and they take up a bit too much of the screen. It's not a problem with Mk1-size rockets, but when you're working with Rockomax fuel tanks, it's a little uncomfortable. Is there a way to zoom in and out while in the VAB?

Edited June 24, 2013 by SuperWeegee4000
You hold Shift and use the mouse wheel to zoom in/out. Hope this helps, have a nice day
Or use the keypad "+" and "-" keys. Here's a list of all the default controls: http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Controls
